results.title: Malcolm McKinnon: 6 films for MAP at ACMI
results.brief_description: A collection of six short documentary films from an ongoing project between the filmmaker, Malcolm McKinnon, and small museums in the Wimmera farming region of Victoria. They comprise of local stories told by local people from such areas as Warracknabeal, Rainbow, Murtoa, Brim and Coromby.
results.title_for_label: Malcolm McKinnon: 6 films for MAP at ACMI
results.description: A collection of six short documentary films from an ongoing project between the filmmaker, Malcolm McKinnon, and small museums in the Wimmera farming region of Victoria. results.title: Anti-Cancer Council ad: 'You in the black box'
results.brief_description: This television advertisement made by the Anti-Cancer Council of Victoria (now Cancer Council Victoria) formed part of the first Australian anti-tobacco advertising campaign which launched on 5 June 1971. Taking a stark and satirical tone, this campaign aimed to undermine the glamourisation of smoking created by cigarette company advertising.
results.title_for_label: Anti-Cancer Council ad: ‘You in the black box’
results.description: This television advertisement made by the Anti-Cancer Council of Victoria (now Cancer Council Victoria) formed part of the first Australian anti-tobacco advertising campaign which launched on 5 June 1971.
